Agile Board Website

Simple Agile Board

Welcome to AgileBoard, a project I developed to streamline task management with modern, user-friendly features.

This web application offers seamless theme switching between light and dark modes, providing a tailored experience that suits any working environment.

Key functionalities include intuitive task management, where users can effortlessly add and delete tasks with a simple click.

Additionally, AgileBoard supports dynamic view switching between Launch and Roadmap, allowing users to strategically plan and track project milestones effectively.

The application also features a robust task status management system. Users can easily move tasks between To Do, Doing, and Done columns, ensuring a clear and organized workflow.

AgileBoard is designed to enhance productivity with its clean, responsive design and powerful features.
